text: Zee Bangla is a Bengali cable television channel in India. It is offered by Zee Network, part of the Essel Group. The first Bengali television channel in India, Zee Bangla was launched in 1999 by Zee TV's chairman. It aired the comedy show "Raja and Gaja" before the show switched stations. ==YouTube== It has its own YouTube Channel. ==Current Broadcast== ===Drama=== * Amar Sangi * Puber Moyna * Anandi * Tui Amar
